overview:
Im a Senior Web Analyst who values an analytical approach to evaluate and improve Internet channel ROI.

11+ years of experience on web development provided me a solid foundation to Online Marketing and effectively communicate at both CXO and IT level.

I value an holistic approach to improve web performance backed by a strong technical background and experience.

My everyday job includes but its not limited to: Web Analytics, Strategy, Web Information Architecture, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), User Experience (UX), SEM (Search Engine Marketing), Site Optimization, E-commerce and Web performance in general.

I’m an Intrapreneur (In). Enthusiastic and sociable, I like working on cutting edge projects with highly motivated and open minded people.
